main event: An unidentified light was observed near Minot, Bismarck, North Dakota on March 10, 1961.
interesting points: The light changed colors from white, yellow, green, and red, The object was stationary for a period of fifteen minutes, The report indicated that the light was observed approximately three to four miles off the northwest radar at one thousand feet, Local sheriffs in North Dakota were tracking the light from Bismarck, The investigation concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: sheriffs in North Dakota tracking the light
